body: # Hosted demo ### Features that ease administration 1. Simple way for management / administrators to view the health of the AD replication. 2. Consolidates output generated from repadmin.exe 3. Displays the most severe issues on top. 4. Color codes the status for each servers replication. 5. Two views allow a quick snapshot of the forests health for management and a more detailed replication screen for the administrators.
tagline: Tool to check the status of every domain controller in an MS AD forest and view the status very easily.  Uses the output from repadmin.exe to display an easier to read report without duplicates.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Repadmin-report
